archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: ERP SAP Business ByDesign
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
SAP Business ByDesign (ByD) is a cloud enterprise resource planning software (Cloud ERP) that is sold and operated as software as a service by SAP SE. It is designed for small (20 Mio of revenue) and medium-sized enterprises (>=350 Mio of revenue).
SAP ByDesign -> BizTalk -> LCI -> SAP BW SAP ByDesign -> BizTalk -> JDA -> SAP BW
